Public Member Functions

 PLBasicSynapse (float W=1)

Detailed Description

Synapse that supports piecewise linear spike responses.

The PSP amplitude trace of this synapse is a piecewise linear function if a piecewise linear spike response is mounted to it.

Note:
Neurons this synapse is mounted to should implement the Neuron::updatePSRSlope method
See also:
PLResetKernelSpikeResponse
PLAdditiveKernelSpikeResponse
PLExpPoissonNeuron
